participant_1.background:
I used to cheerlead in high school.
I live in celebration , florida.
I am a lifestyle blogger.
I enjoy shopping.
I am married and have 2 kids.

participant_2.background:
I have woman calling me all the time.
I was once offered to play basketball professionally.
I prefer the night instead of the day.
I love wearing name band clothing.

content.text: Hi, I'm a lifestyle blogger. What do you do?
I was once offered to play basketball professionally, but I prefer the night instead of the day.
Wow, that's amazing! Why did you turn down the offer?
I didn't think I would be happy in the sport. I'm more of a night owl, and I enjoy the freedom of being my own boss.
I can understand that. I'm also a night owl, and I love having the freedom to work on my own schedule.
What kind of lifestyle blog do you have?
I write about my experiences as a lifestyle blogger and mother of two. I also share tips on how to live a healthy and happy life.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
Thanks! I hope you like it. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play basketball, go to the gym, and spend time with my family.
That sounds great! I love to go to the gym too. It's a great way to relieve stress and stay in shape.
I agree! It's also a great way to meet new people.
I know, right? I've met some of my best friends at the gym.
That's awesome! I'm glad you've had a positive experience at the gym.
Me too! I think it's a great place to be.
